divs: Sighting DetailsI left my house at approximately 7:45 to pick up my fiance from work. When I got to Rent-A-Center (his work) I sat in the car for a few minutes waiting for him to come out. I saw something out of the corner of my eye (to the left) and saw three orangish-yellow lights hovering. They formed a single line that pointed up at a diagonal and the highest point was to the left. I watched them disappear and reappear and each time the lights disappeared and reappeared, they were at the same angle just a little higher in the sky. I ran into the store to tell my fiance and his co worker to come outside and they came out in time to see the lights a couple of times before they disappeared. I tried to record some video on my cell phone, but as soon as I got the camera setting on it activated the lights were gone. We waited for about 5 minutes to see if anything would show, but nothing else happened. There was no sound during the entire event. After we saw the last lights disappear, we saw a plane flying through the same air space where the lights had previously been, and we could identify the plane and hear it, unlike the lights we saw only moments before.
Summary: saw 3 orange lights moving at an upward diagonal to the left and lights came on and off
